meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Linnaea, having fragrant pink or white bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with the sweet scent of twinflowers.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of twinflowers for her mother.
meanings.sent3: The bees danced happily around the twinflowers, enjoying their perfume.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the delicate petals of twinflowers, spreading joy.
meanings.sent5: The twinflowers swayed gently in the breeze, a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A pair of identical or similar flowers growing on a single stem.
meanings.sent1: The twinflowers in the garden looked perfectly matched.
meanings.sent2: He marveled at the symmetry of the twinflowers blooming together.
meanings.sent3: The twinflowers seemed to be whispering secrets to each other in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like the twinflowers, growing side by side in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The twinflowers stood proudly together, a mirror image of beauty.
